mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO importHealthdrugs ( productor_name_en, unregister_reason, addre, health_func, constitute, main_material, unlimite_scope, limite_scope, specification, expiration_date, reserve_method, lookout, approval_change_date, changed_content, record_date, exchanger_name, exchanger_name_en, exchanger_addre, taker, taker_addr, approval_before, exchange_date, supplement_date, extra_hint, product_name_en, approval_date, applicant_chinese_name, product_sn, approval, product_name, applicant_name, applicant_addre, company_name, produce_county, use_illustration, record_content, taker_en, validate_date_to, unregister_date, pageId, url )
VALUES ( #{item.productor_name_en}, #{item.unregister_reason}, #{item.addre}, #{item.health_func}, #{item.constitute}, #{item.main_material}, #{item.unlimite_scope}, #{item.limite_scope}, #{item.specification}, #{item.expiration_date}, #{item.reserve_method}, #{item.lookout}, #{item.approval_change_date}, #{item.changed_content}, #{item.record_date}, #{item.exchanger_name}, #{item.exchanger_name_en}, #{item.exchanger_addre}, #{item.taker}, #{item.taker_addr}, #{item.approval_before}, #{item.exchange_date}, #{item.supplement_date}, #{item.extra_hint}, #{item.product_name_en}, #{item.approval_date}, #{item.applicant_chinese_name}, #{item.product_sn}, #{item.approval}, #{item.product_name}, #{item.applicant_name}, #{item.applicant_addre}, #{item.company_name}, #{item.produce_county}, #{item.use_illustration}, #{item.record_content}, #{item.taker_en}, #{item.validate_date_to}, #{item.unregister_date}, #{item.pageId}, #{item.url} )
